parameter.description: Total number of MPEG2-TS packets with an invalid transport sync byte received for this AV stream. Not meaningful when MPEG2-TS is transported over IP.

parameter.name: TSSyncLossCount
parameter.description: Total number of MPEG2-TS Loss of Synchronization Events for this AV stream. Not meaningful when MPEG2-TS is transported over IP.

parameter.name: PacketDiscontinuityCounter
parameter.description: Total number of MPEG2-TS Discontinuity errors that have been captured for this AV stream. This parameter accumulates all of the discontinuities observed for all currently monitored PIDs. These statistics are collected when no CA decryption scheme is in use or after any CA decryption if in use.

parameter.name: PacketDiscontinuityCounterBeforeCA
parameter.description: Total number of MPEG2-TS Discontinuity errors that have been captured for this AV stream. This parameter accumulates all of the discontinuities observed for all currently monitored PIDs. These statistics are collected before any CA decryption scheme, if used, is applied.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Total.VideoDecoderStats.
object.description: Total video decoder application layer statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance.

parameter.name: FrameRate
parameter.description: The frame rate at which the STB played out the video content for this AV stream.

parameter.name: DecodedFrames
parameter.description: The number of video frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) for this AV stream.

parameter.name: LostFrames
parameter.description: The number of video frames that could not be reproduced by the STB for this AV stream.

parameter.name: ConcealedFrames
parameter.description: The number of video frames that were reproduced by the STB for which some information was missing and loss concealment was applied for this AV stream.

parameter.name: IDecodedFrames
parameter.description: The number of I frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) for this AV stream.

parameter.name: ILostFrames
parameter.description: The number of I frames that could not be reproduced by the STB for this AV stream.

parameter.name: IConcealedFrames
parameter.description: The number of I frames that were reproduced by the STB for which some information was missing and loss concealment applied for this AV stream.

parameter.name: PDecodedFrames
parameter.description: The number of P frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) for this AV stream.

parameter.name: PLostFrames
parameter.description: The number of P frames that could not be reproduced by the STB for this AV stream.

parameter.name: PConcealedFrames
parameter.description: The number of P frames that were reproduced by the STB for which some information was missing and loss concealment applied for this AV stream.

parameter.name: BDecodedFrames
parameter.description: The number of B frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) for this AV stream.

parameter.name: BLostFrames
parameter.description: The number of B frames that could not be reproduced by the STB for this AV stream.

parameter.name: BConcealedFrames
parameter.description: The number of B frames that were reproduced by the STB for which some information was missing and loss concealment applied for this AV stream.

parameter.name: AVResynchCounter
parameter.description: The number of AV resynchronizations that were performed by the STB for this AV stream.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Total.AudioDecoderStats.
object.description: Total audio decoder application layer statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance.

parameter.name: DecodedFrames
parameter.description: The number of audio frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) for this AV stream.

parameter.name: DecodingErrors
parameter.description: The number of audio decoding errors detected for this AV stream.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Total.VideoResponseStats.
object.description: Total video response statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance.

parameter.name: MinimumVideoSystemResponse
parameter.description: Minimum time period (in {{units}}) between the instant of transmitting an IGMP JOIN command or an RTSP SETUP command, and the display of the first I frame for this AV stream.

parameter.name: MaximumVideoSystemResponse
parameter.description: Maximum time period (in {{units}}) between the instant of transmitting an IGMP JOIN command or an RTSP SETUP command, and the display of the first I frame for this AV stream.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.
object.description: Sample statistics collected since collection was last enabled or reset. Most of the parameters in this object are comma-separated lists of individual statistics values, each of which corresponds to a sample interval. The statistics values in these comma-separated lists MUST be in time order, with the oldest one first and the most recent one last. Each comma-separated list can contain up to ''ReportSamples'' statistics values. When the list is full, each new value causes the oldest one to be discarded. If no data was collected for a statistic during a sample interval then the value for that sample interval MUST be zero unless otherwise specified in the description of the individual statistics parameter.

parameter.name: SampleSeconds
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of seconds during which data was collected for this AV stream during the sample interval. Each statistics category (Dejittering, RTP etc) has its own ''SampleSeconds'' parameter, which indicates the number of seconds during which data was collected for that statistics category during the sample interval. Individual ''SampleSeconds'' values can be less than the ''SampleInterval'', for several reasons, including: * The STB was in Standby mode for all or part of the sample interval. * ''TimeReference'' has been set to a time other than the Unknown Time and the current sample interval started part of the way through a scheduled sample interval. * ''ForceSample'' has been used to force statistics for the current sample to be calculated and updated in the data model.

parameter.name: SignificantChanges
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of times that a channel change (or other potentially disruptive event) occurred for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: PVRTimeShift
parameter.description: Each entry is a Boolean that indicates whether the PVR, with a non-zero time-shift, was used at any time for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: HighLevelMetricStatsNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: Number of {{object|HighLevelMetricStats}} instances.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.DejitteringStats.
object.description: De-jittering Sample statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance.

parameter.name: SampleSeconds
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of seconds during which de-jittering data was collected for this AV stream during the sample interval. Individual {{param}} values can be less than the sample interval, for several reasons, including: * Any of the reasons for which the {{param|.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.SampleSeconds}} values might be less than the sample interval. * De-jittering data collection is not appropriate or possible for this AV stream.

parameter.name: Overruns
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of times the receive jitter buffer has overrun for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: Underruns
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of times the receive jitter buffer has underrun for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: EmptyBufferTime
parameter.description: Each entry is the time period, in {{units}}, for which the playout buffer was empty for this AV stream during the sample interval.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.RTPStats.
object.description: RTP Sample statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance. If no EC is applied the ''BeforeEC'' statistics provide the same values as the corresponding statistics, e.g. when there is no EC, {{param|PacketsReceivedBeforeEC}} = {{param|PacketsReceived}}.

parameter.name: SampleSeconds
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of seconds during which RTP data was collected for this AV stream during the sample interval. Individual {{param}} values can be less than the sample interval, for several reasons, including: * Any of the reasons for which the {{param|.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.SampleSeconds}} values might be less than the sample interval. * RTP data collection is not appropriate or possible for this AV stream.

parameter.name: PacketsExpected
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of RTP packets expected for this AV stream during the sample interval as described in {{bibref|RFC3550|A.3}}.

parameter.name: PacketsDiscarded
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of packets that were discarded at the RTP layer for this AV stream during the sample interval because they were too late for playout, regardless of their being out of sequence or not. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: PacketsOutOfSequence
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of packets out of sequence at the RTP level for this AV stream during the sample interval, regardless of their being too late for playout or not. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: PacketsReceived
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of RTP packets received for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: PacketsReceivedBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of RTP packets received for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

parameter.name: RetransmitTimeouts
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of RTP/AVPF retransmission timeouts ({{bibref|RFC4585}}, {{bibref|RFC4588}}) for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: PacketsLost
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of RTP packets lost for this AV stream during the sample interval. Calculated by looking for missing RTP sequence headers. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: PacketsLostBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of RTP packets lost for this AV stream during the sample interval. Calculated by looking for missing RTP sequence headers. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

parameter.name: LossEvents
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of Loss Events for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: LossEventsBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of Loss Events for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

parameter.name: SevereLossIndexCount
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of Loss Events that occurred at a distance shorter than ''SevereLossMinDistance'' from the previous Loss Event for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: SevereLossIndexCountBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of Loss Events that occurred at a distance shorter than ''SevereLossMinDistance'' from the previous Loss Event for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

parameter.name: AverageLossDistance
parameter.description: Each entry is the average distance in {{units}} between consecutive Loss Events for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: AverageLossDistanceBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the average distance in {{units}} between consecutive loss events for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

parameter.name: MinimumLossDistance
parameter.description: Each entry is the length in {{units}} of the shortest distance between consecutive Loss Events for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: MinimumLossDistanceBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the length in {{units}} of the shortest distance between consecutive Loss Events for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

parameter.name: SevereLossLengthCount
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of Loss Events with length in RTP packets greater than ''SevereLossMinLength'' for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: SevereLossLengthCountBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of Loss Events with length in RTP packets greater than ''SevereLossMinLength'' for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

parameter.name: MaximumLossPeriod
parameter.description: Each entry is the length in {{units}} of the longest Loss Event for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: MaximumLossPeriodBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the length in {{units}} of the longest Loss Event for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

parameter.name: AverageLossPeriod
parameter.description: Each entry is the average length in {{units}} of Loss Events for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: AverageLossPeriodBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the average length in {{units}} of Loss Events for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

parameter.name: MinimumLossPeriod
parameter.description: Each entry is the length in {{units}} of the shortest RTP Loss Event for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no EC is applied or after any EC if available.

parameter.name: MinimumLossPeriodBeforeEC
parameter.description: Each entry is the length in {{units}} of the shortest RTP Loss Event for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any EC, if available, is applied.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.MPEG2TSStats.
object.description: MPEG2-TS Sample statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance.

parameter.name: SampleSeconds
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of seconds during which MPEG2-TS data was collected for this AV stream during the sample interval. Individual {{param}} values can be less than the sample interval, for several reasons, including: * Any of the reasons for which the {{param|.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.SampleSeconds}} values might be less than the sample interval. * MPEG2-TS data collection is not appropriate or possible for this AV stream.

parameter.name: TSPacketsReceived
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of MPEG2-TS packets received for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: TSPacketsDrained
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of good MPEG2-TS packets removed from the buffer for this AV stream during the sample interval. Packets received minus packets drained provides an indication how close the buffer came to over or under running during the sample interval.

parameter.name: TSSyncByteErrorCount
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of MPEG2-TS packets with an invalid transport sync byte for this AV stream during the sample interval. Not meaningful when MPEG2-TS is transported over IP.

parameter.name: TSSyncLossCount
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of MPEG2-TS Loss of Synchronization Events for this AV stream during the sample interval. Not meaningful when MPEG2-TS is transported over IP.

parameter.name: PacketDiscontinuityCounter
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of MPEG2-TS Discontinuity errors that were captured for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected when no CA decryption scheme is in use or after any CA decryption if in use.

parameter.name: PacketDiscontinuityCounterBeforeCA
parameter.description: Each entry is the total number of MPEG2-TS Discontinuity errors that were captured for this AV stream during the sample interval. These statistics are collected before any CA decryption scheme, if used, is applied.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.VideoDecoderStats.
object.description: Video decoder Sample statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance.

parameter.name: SampleSeconds
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of seconds during which video decoder data was collected for this AV stream during the sample interval. Individual {{param}} values can be less than the sample interval, for several reasons, including: * Any of the reasons for which the {{param|.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.SampleSeconds}} values might be less than the sample interval. * Video Decoder data collection is not appropriate or possible for this AV stream.

parameter.name: FrameRate
parameter.description: Each entry is the frame rate at which the STB played out the video content for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: DecodedFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of video frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: LostFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of video frames that could not be reproduced by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: ConcealedFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of video frames that were reproduced by the STB for which some information was missing for this AV stream during the sample interval and loss concealment was applied.

parameter.name: IDecodedFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of I frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: ILostFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of I frames that could not be reproduced by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: IConcealedFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of I frames that were reproduced by the STB for which some information was missing for this AV stream during the sample interval and loss concealment applied.

parameter.name: PDecodedFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of P frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: PLostFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of P frames that could not be reproduced by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: PConcealedFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of P frames that were reproduced by the STB for which some information was missing for this AV stream during the sample interval and loss concealment applied.

parameter.name: BDecodedFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of B frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: BLostFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of B frames that could not be reproduced by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: BConcealedFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of B frames that were reproduced by the STB for which some information was missing for this AV stream during the sample interval and loss concealment applied.

parameter.name: AVResynchCounter
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of AV resynchronizations that were performed by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.AudioDecoderStats.
object.description: Audio decoder Sample statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance.

parameter.name: SampleSeconds
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of seconds during which audio decoder data was collected for this AV stream during the sample interval. Individual {{param}} values can be less than the sample interval, for several reasons, including: * Any of the reasons for which the {{param|.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.SampleSeconds}} values might be less than the sample interval. * Audio decoder data collection is not appropriate or possible for this AV stream.

parameter.name: DecodedFrames
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of audio frames that were decoded completely (errorless frames) or partially (corrupted frames) by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: DecodingErrors
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of audio decoding errors detected by the STB for this AV stream during the sample interval.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.VideoResponseStats.
object.description: Video response Sample statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance.

parameter.name: SampleSeconds
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of seconds during which video response data was collected for this AV stream during the sample interval. Individual {{param}} values can be less than the sample interval, for several reasons, including: * Any of the reasons for which the {{param|.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.SampleSeconds}} values might be less than the sample interval. * Video response data collection is not appropriate or possible for this AV stream.

parameter.name: AverageVideoSystemResponse
parameter.description: Each entry is the time period (in {{units}}) between the instant of transmitting an IGMP JOIN or an RTSP SETUP command and the display of the first I frame, computed as the average of the VideoSystemResponse events that occured for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: MinimumVideoSystemResponse
parameter.description: Each entry is the minimum time period (in {{units}}) between the instant of transmitting an IGMP JOIN or an RTSP SETUP command and the display of the first I frame for this AV stream during the sample interval.

parameter.name: MaximumVideoSystemResponse
parameter.description: Each entry is the maximum time period (in {{units}}) between the instant of transmitting an IGMP JOIN or an RTSP SETUP command and the display of the first I frame for this AV stream during the sample interval.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.HighLevelMetricStats.{i}.
object.description: High-level metric Sample statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance. One or more different high-level metrics can be supported.

parameter.name: MetricName
parameter.description: Indicates a unique identifier for this high-level metric.

parameter.name: Metric1Threshold
parameter.description: The threshold value that controls the calculation of the {{param|Metric1Failures}} parameter.

parameter.name: Metric2Threshold
parameter.description: The threshold value that controls the calculation of the {{param|Metric2Failures}} parameter.

parameter.name: SampleSeconds
parameter.description: Each entry is the number of seconds during which this high-level metric's data was collected for this AV stream during the sample interval. Individual {{param}} values can be less than the sample interval, for several reasons, including: * Any of the reasons for which the {{param|.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Sample.SampleSeconds}} values might be less than the sample interval. * This high-level metric's data collection is not appropriate or possible for this AV stream.

parameter.name: Metric1
parameter.description: Each entry is a high-level metric calculated for this AV stream during the sample interval. The interpretation of the metric values is algorithm-specific; the only constraints are that values must be numeric, in the range [0:65535] and that lower values indicate worse QoE than do higher values.

parameter.name: Metric2
parameter.description: Each entry is a high-level metric calculated for this AV stream during the sample interval. The interpretation of the metric values is algorithm-specific; the only constraints are that values must be numeric, in the range [0:65535] and that lower values indicate worse QoE than do higher values.

parameter.name: Metric1Failures
parameter.description: Counts the number of times (since the last time this ''MainStream'' and Sample statistics collection were both enabled) that a newly-calculated value of high-level metric {{param|Metric1}} was less than or equal to {{param|Metric1Threshold}}. This parameter can be incremented at any time during a sample interval, and might be incremented more than once during a single sample interval.

parameter.name: Metric2Failures
parameter.description: Counts the number of times (since the last time this ''MainStream'' and Sample statistics collection were both enabled) that a newly-calculated value of high-level metric {{param|Metric2}} was less than or equal to {{param|Metric2Threshold}}. This parameter can be incremented at any time during a sample interval, and might be incremented more than once during a single sample interval.

object.name: STBService.{i}.Applications.
object.description: Applications.

object.name: STBService.{i}.Applications.AudienceStats.
object.description: Audience viewing statistics.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables collection of viewing statistics. Enabling collection of viewing statistics also resets the viewing statistics table.

parameter.name: Reset
parameter.description: When set to {{true}} resets the viewing statistics table. Setting it to {{false}} has no effect. The value is not saved in device state and is always {{false}} when read. Resetting statistics MUST reset all {{param|Channel.{i}.Duration}} parameters.

parameter.name: ResetTime
parameter.description: Number of {{units}} since the Audience statistics were last enabled or reset.

parameter.name: ChannelNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: Number of instances of {{object|Channel}}.

object.name: STBService.{i}.Applications.AudienceStats.Channel.{i}.
object.description: Table to record what the STB has been receiving. Time durations are recorded only for an AVPlayer's main AVStream (i.e. for TV channels being displayed in the main screen). Each entry corresponds to a given TV channel and is indexed by channel name (the instance number is chosen by the STB and is not related to the channel number).

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: String describing the TV channel being displayed in the main screen. MUST be the value of the corresponding {{param|.AVStreams.AVStream.{i}.Name}} parameter.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.description: The cumulative duration of this channel in {{units}}.
